title: Paramount's Larry and David Ellison might look to Middle East petrostates to help finance a deal for WBD. That's tricky.
description: Paramount might rely on financing from Middle Eastern petrostates for its offer to buy Warner Bros Discovery. That raises some tricky issues.

title: Haters gonna hate! Diego Lopes responds to critics after landing title rematch at UFC 325: ‘Get to work and stop whining’
description: Diego Lopes will be fighting Alexander Volkanovski once again for the undisputed UFC featherweight title at UFC 325 on Jan. 31 LIVE on Paramount+ from Sydney, Australia, whether you like it or not. Fight fans were thrown a bit of a curveball on Thanksgiving Day after UFC CEO Dana White announced some bombshell matchups to […]

title: UFC 324: 5 possible main events for Paramount debut, ranked
description: With two months to go until UFC 324, we take a look at who should be headlining the promotion's big debut on Paramount. It has to be great, right?

title: Why Comcast could go all out to buy Warner Bros. Discovery
description: Paramount, Comcast, and Netflix are battling over Warner Bros. Discovery. Comcast may be more motivated to make a deal than David Ellison's Paramount.

title: Best Paramount Plus coupon and promo codes we've tested in November 2025
description: Paramount Plus often offers money-saving coupon codes that you can apply at checkout. Here are the best working ones we've tested.

title: Netflix, Comcast and Paramount Make Bids for Warner Bros.
description: Netflix Inc., Comcast Corp. and Paramount Skydance Corp. all submitted bids for Warner Bros. Discovery Inc.
